display_long_description:
Welcome to one of the coolest Gorilla Tag fangames out there — a wild, fast-paced, and totally immersive experience inspired by the viral sensation that took VR by storm!

This fangame builds on everything you love about the original Gorilla Tag while introducing new twists, maps, mechanics, and features that take the gameplay to a whole new level. Whether you're a seasoned tagger or totally new to the scene, this game offers an exciting, adrenaline-fueled adventure that's easy to jump into but tough to master.

You play as a gorilla — no buttons, no joysticks — just pure movement. Use only your hands to climb, swing, vault, and chase your friends across a variety of creative and dynamic environments. From dense jungles to neon-lit arenas, icy mountains to haunted forests, every map is packed with unique obstacles and opportunities for insane parkour stunts and high-speed chases.

But it’s not just about running and tagging — this fangame introduces its own custom game modes, cosmetic options, and community features that give it a life of its own. Want to customize your gorilla with wild outfits? Done. Join a private lobby with friends and just vibe? Easy. Compete in chaotic game modes you won’t find anywhere else? Absolutely.

So if you're looking for a fresh, fun, and ridiculously cool take on Gorilla Tag — you just found it.
